Module kivakit.commandline
Package com.telenav.kivakit.commandline

Class SwitchParser.Builder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.commandline.SwitchParser.Builder<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    SwitchParser<T>
    public static class SwitchParser.Builder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A fluent builder for argument parsers. Switches have:
    • Type - The type of the switch
    • Quantifier - The number of times the switch can appear
    • Name - The name of the switch
    • Description - The switch description when giving command line help
    • Converter - Converter between switch string value and Type
    • Default value - A default value if the switch is optional
    • Set of value values - Set of values that are allowed
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
